Articles.Content:
Inventory: nailgun

Time: Morning

Place: Warehouse

Health: Splinted left arm and left leg

You prepare on your quest to kill that crazy woman. First, you get something in your stomach and eat the zombie. It actually tastes like turkey. Next, you put a splint on both your arm and leg. Now you can use them without hurting yourself. You then look around, and find: a pressurized air tank; more PVC; nails; and random knick-knacks. You should probably made a weapon out of these parts, but what? Each design requires the knick-knacks.

a) An air-powered sniper rifle, using your nailgun, PVC, and air tank

Keep nailgun intact, make a pressurized shotgun out of the tank and PVC

c) Keep looking for more tools

d) What are you doing? You\'re so inhuman!
e) That Lawn Dart laying on the shelf

Inventory: Sniper rifle, 25 nails, needle, axe, helmet

Time: Noon

Place: Woman\'s street

Health: Limp, and need some time to set up two-handed things

You construct a sniper rifle out of your parts, and head over to the woman\'s house. Along the way, you see a zombie and shoot it as a test target. The nail zips right through its brain, and into a wall behind it. You grab the nail and continue walking. You find an axe and pick it up, it may come in handy. You also find a hypodermic needle (again filled with something you don\'t know what) and a helmet. When you reach her house, you see her outside her house, but a zombie arrives and she ducks inside for cover. You have several options on how to set up and lure her out. Just as you begin to think, you remember about the light you saw last night. Should you forget about her and go after the light?

a) Use the axe to break down some of her defenses, then get on top of a house and get ready to snipe!

Break in and fight her outright.

c) Get a better idea of the battlefield.

d) Forget about her and go after the light.

e) Jeb arrives with yet another rocket.

Inventory: Sniper rifle, 25 nails, needle, axe, helmet

Time: Night

Place: 20 Miles from light

Health: Limp, and need some time to set up two-handed things

After walking nearly all day, you decide to set up camp. Since you\'re nowhere near any civilization, no hordes appear during the night, so you are free to do whatever you need to.

a) Try the needle

Target practice

c) Keep walking

d) Sleep
^^ youve been walking all day, and are now in a place with NO ZOMBIES. What would you do?

a

^^ youve been walking all day, and are now in a place with NO ZOMBIES. What would you do?

A The character\'s a druggo in my mind.
ok then. turn him into bill

Inventory: A stick, zombie hand, and an elephant

Time: Vanilla

Place: 30 seconds from nowhere

Health: Fur on right arm, scales on left

Your character decides to try the needle. He injects it, then starts hallucinating.

You watch a herd of shoes fly by as your turtle eats itself. If you could maybe reach that peppermint cane, you might rescue the foam belt.

a) The peppermint cane is attacked by elephants?

Eat the cane

c) Hunt some elephants

d) Eat your fur

c

let some killing begin!

Inventory: A stick, zombie hand, and an elephant

Time: Plankton

Place: Fleshnap

Health: scales on left arm

You grab your arm and start gnawing on it. By 16 o\'dripple, you have cleaned off all the fur on your arm. You then see a gumdrop bear, and decide to chase after it.

a) SNAP OUT OF IT!

Eat the bear

c) Mask the flib with your duvnig

d) Dig a hole with your elephant
B. After walking all day, I bet your hungry!
E: Take the banana to Lenny. He\'s gonna need it if the condor flies!

A and Omega , Turn into a Arch Angel and obliterate the zombies then turn into the Paladin and use your aura blast on the main one turn your cape into wings and fly up to the sky scraper and charge your energy and shock wave those bastards.

Inventory: Sniper rifle, 25 nails, needle, axe, helmet

Time: Morning

Place: Middle of nowhere

Health: Limp, and need some time to set up two-handed things

You chase after the gumdrop bear, but after a few bites you pass out. you wake up, and realize you were hallucinating. You look where you remember the gumdrop bear being, and realized you just bit into a zombie. You decide to take a look around, and see a few things: buildings on the horizon to the north; a few stray zombies to the south; a lake to the east; nothing to the west.

a) Go to the north

Go to the south

c) Go to the east

d) Go to the west

Inventory: Sniper rifle, 25 nails, needle, axe, helmet

Time: Morning

Place: A lake

Health: Limp, and need some time to set up two-handed things

You go to the lake and decide to fish. After all you\'re hungry. But all the fish are dead and floating!

A grey plume catches your eye to the left. At first you think it\'s that green thinger in his rocket but you realize that it could

be related to all this.

A.)Investigate that plume

B.)Find that little guy

C.)Continue to fish

D.)Drink the rancid water
